channel.title: AI on Ninad Naik
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Ninad Naik

item.title: What is Intelligence?
item.description: A philosophical exploration of what intelligence truly is—across humans, animals, and machines—arguing that our failure to understand intelligence means we're building powerful AI systems without knowing what we're actually creating.

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description: An introduction to my thoughts on technology, AI, and product strategy
